alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:58AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cook, southwestern Irwin, northwestern Berrien, southeastern Turner, Colquitt, Tift and southeastern Worth Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1058 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Ashburn to Doerun. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Moultrie, Enigma, Omega, Norman Park, Lenox, Doerun, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Riverside, Poulan, Schley, Berlin, Funston, Sumner, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Minton and Scooterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth
